metadata.title: Contact Event Logic - Get Help with Your Events
metadata.description: Contact Event Logic for information about our event management platform. We're here to help you with your events and meetings.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us with any questions, feedback, or inquiries.

question1.question: How quickly can I expect a response?
question1.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

question2.question: I'm interested in a demo. How do I schedule one?
question2.answer: You can schedule a demo by clicking the "Book Demo" button in the navigation menu, or by contacting us directly through this form.

question3.question: Do you offer support in languages other than English and Swedish?
question3.answer: Currently, our platform and support are available in English and Swedish. We're working on adding more languages in the future.
